plays.text: Penalty to Nathan Dempsey 2 minutes for Interference Kyle Wanvig
Penalty to Steve Thomas 2 minutes for Diving Kyle Wanvig
Penalty to Kyle Wanvig 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Steve Thomas
Penalty to Jim Dowd 2 minutes for Hooking Steve Poapst
Penalty to Alexander Karpovtsev 2 minutes for Hooking Wes Walz
Penalty to Lubomir Sekeras 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Zhamnov
Goal scored by Sergei Berezin assisted by Eric Daze and Phil Housley
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Eric Daze
Goal scored by Wes Walz assisted by Andrew Brunette and Antti Laaksonen
Goal scored by Stephane Veilleux assisted by Richard Park and Filip Kuba
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Alexei Zhamnov and Lyle Odelein
Penalty to Steve McCarthy 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Kyle Wanvig 2 minutes for Crosschecking Nathan Dempsey
Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for High Sticking Wes Walz
